title: AMC The Killing Logo Font
content:
Hello,

I'm trying to identify the font that is used in AMC's "The Killing" logo. I'm only concerned with the font in all caps.

Here is a link to the logo in question: [The Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404221103/http:/www.foxinflight.com/content/fif_tv_products/76/gallery/(1)1216_theKilling_logo_for_large_use.jpg)

Thank You
author: slashsarc

comments.content: KILLING looks a lot like DIN Heavy (i looked at DIN Next but they are all much the same to me, without getting into the infinite details of origin)

the: [Arial](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404221103/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/arial)  
KILLING: as previously suggested by Jodie try [DIN Next LT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404221103/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-next) or [DIN Text PF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404221103/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Pf+din+text) to get /G top finial obically cut (main difference with FontFont "regular" version of [DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404221103/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-din))

It is not Din or Arial. Its similar to din, but the S (used in other credit names) and other letters are very different.

Hope somebody know the font, im lookin for it too :)
